thread.title: Local News: Media couple Betty Kyallo and Dennis Okari hang out with lions in thrilling honeymoon
thread.title_full: Local News: Media couple Betty Kyallo and Dennis Okari hang out with lions in thrilling honeymoon

title: Local News: Media couple Betty Kyallo and Dennis Okari hang out with lions in thrilling honeymoon
text:
By Wesley Kipng'enoh Saturday, Oct 10th 2015 at 10:10 Betty and Dennis at the Casela park Photo:Courtesy 
By Wesley Kipng'enoh (@Wess_kipp) 
KTN news anchor Betty Kyallo and husband Dennis Okari are on their honeymoon after their beautiful wedding held a week ago in Nairobi. 
The couple is in Mauritius. In the country, they have managed to visit the Casela Park where hanging around lions, is apparently a thing! The couple admitted that it was indeed the most dangerous thing they have done so far in their honeymoon. 
Meaning we should expect more thrills from their trip. Well, one thing is for sure, they are having times of their lives. 
Here is post that appeared on theirs Facebook Timelines 
The most dangerous thing we’ve done so far on our honeymoon, walking with Lions for 45 minutes. Took Matata & Matala for a morning walk inside Casela park. It doesn’t get better than this in Mauritius.
